price: Mi smo Ga u dovi molili, On je, doista, Dobročinitelj, Milostivi.”
arabic: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلُ نَدۡعُوهُۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā kunnā min qablu nadʿūhu innahu huwa al-baru al-raḥīmu
